DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine proportion participant initiate allergen immunotherapy ( AIT ) upon recommendation physician proportion participant persist AIT throughout recommended course .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Record Review Adults Children Advised Allergen Immunotherapy ( MK-7243-022 )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis AR without allergic conjunctivitis ( AC ) Documented providertopatient parent discussion AIT treatment option Participants receive AIT AR treatment without documented providertopatient parent discussion AIT treatment option Participants receive immunotherapy insect sensitivity AIT start 2005
